summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Portfolio Optimizer with ML-based return prediction. All 7 ML models successfully trained and compared, with results saved to /app/model_comparison_results.json. Both stocks and crypto assets supported with all three rebalancing frequencies (daily, weekly, on-demand). Complete workflow tested: asset search → selection → optimization → backtesting → model training.
passed_tests: API Health Check - All endpoints accessible
Asset Search - Both stocks and crypto working
Historical Data Fetching - yfinance integration working
Portfolio Optimization - Mean-variance optimization with risk tolerance
ML Model Training - All 7 models (Linear Regression, Ridge, Lasso, Elastic Net, Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, XGBoost) trained successfully
Model Comparison - Best model selection based on test R² score
Results Persistence - Model results saved to /app/model_comparison_results.json
Backtesting - Comprehensive performance metrics (CAGR, Sharpe, Volatility, Max Drawdown)
Rebalancing Frequencies - All three options (daily, weekly, on-demand) working
Dashboard - Portfolio history and statistics display
Navigation - All pages accessible and functional
Asset Types - Both stocks (AAPL, MSFT, GOOGL) and crypto (BTC-USD, ETH-USD) supported
UI Components - All buttons clickable, forms functional, results displayed properly
Charts - Cumulative returns chart rendering correctly
Dark Theme - Professional modern styling with 3D effects implemented
